named-query.name: MonitorInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfoEntity a ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfoEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfoEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfoEntity.findByMonitorTypeId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfoEntity a WHERE a.monitorTypeId = :monitorTypeId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfoEntity.findByCalendarId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfoEntity a WHERE a.calendarId = :calendarId ORDER BY a.monitorId

named-query.name: MonitorInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM MonitorInfoEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.monitorId
